tool_description: Coordinates inventory transfers between warehouse locations to optimize stock distribution and minimize stockouts across the network.

source_locations.description: List of source warehouse locations with excess inventory

destination_locations.description: List of destination warehouse locations needing inventory

product_skus.description: List of product SKUs to consider for transfer

max_transfer_cost.description: Maximum acceptable cost per unit for transfers

priority_destinations.description: Priority destination locations to fulfill first

minimum_transfer_quantity.description: Minimum quantity to make transfer economical

transfer_lead_time_days.description: Expected lead time for inter-warehouse transfers

error_messages: Invalid warehouse locations: One or more source or destination locations are not recognized.
No available inventory: Source locations do not have sufficient inventory for specified SKUs.
Invalid product SKUs: One or more SKUs are not found in the inventory system.
Transfer cost too high: Proposed transfers exceed max_transfer_cost threshold.
Invalid transfer parameters: minimum_transfer_quantity and transfer_lead_time_days must be positive.
usage: Provide source_locations, destination_locations, and product_skus. Optionally set cost constraints, priorities, and minimum transfer quantities for optimization.

recommended_transfers.description: Array of transfer recommendations in format 'Source|Destination|SKU|Quantity|Cost'

total_transfer_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all recommended transfers

locations_optimized.description: Number of destination locations that will be optimized
